data.message: What did you do to the last update?????  It's horrible!!!!  It just keeps reloading and jumps all over the place. Once I see something I might want to read it reloads and jumps again.  Makes me so mad.  Why can't you make it stay where you are looking until I want it to refresh?!?

replies.message: Hi Jeremy. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. Please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2qC6cRS. Thanks. -Jessica
